title: Rightwards Hand
description:
An open right hand facing right, so as to show the back of the hand with the thumb on the top and the pinky on the bottom.

This emoji was developed along with ü´≤ Leftwards Hand to allow for the creation of ZWJ Sequences that depict ü§ù Handshake with two different skin tone modifiers applied, one to each hand.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the rightwards hand emoji is rendered with a clean, open palm facing right, subtly shaded with Apple's hallmark glossy 3D effect and smooth gradients. The realistic lighting casts gentle shadows, giving the hand a tactile and inviting feel with softly rounded edges. This emoji, appearing on Apple devices, is a dynamic symbol for direction, progression, and moving forward, often used to indicate a path, agree with a statement, or point towards something to the right.
